::Zardus::

Zardus looks from Nemesis to the two Oblitercons. "The maximals are being 
attacked," he says, "If we are going to ally with them to defeat the 
newcomers, it would be good to gain their trust by defeating these invaders. 
Follow me."

Zardus flies off toward the Ark. This should prove ... interesting.
